name: Pattern breaking
description:
Please…I want to feel you watching me
We only have these two minutes
I’m fairly convinced they will change everything.
I delicately kiss your face.
Courting is about rhythm
the pleasure’s in the anticipation
you just need to give yourself to it,
get lost to get found.
I want to breathe again.

Art journal pages made in an upcycled modular planner, original 7” x 9”, 5547 x 4060 px. watercolor, found/vintage papers, ink. Cento composed with words from The J. Peterman Company Owner’s Manual No. 127, Spring 2015.
